explains: n. 刺激；（赶牲口用的）刺棒；激励
vt. 刺激；激励；用刺棒驱赶；煽动

sentences.en: Her presence was just one more goad to Joanna's unravelling nerves.
sentences.cn: 她的出现只是对乔安娜几近崩溃的神经的又一次刺激。

sentences.en: Theon knew he should not goad her.
sentences.cn: 席恩知道他不该刺激他。

sentences.en: They goad Jack to go back inside to be with his family.
sentences.cn: 他们劝杰克不要冲动，返回反恐组去与家人团聚。
